info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 3:46PM EDT until August 03 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Saratoga County in east central New York... Southwestern Washington County in east central New York... Northwestern Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 346 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Country Knolls, or near Clifton Park, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clifton Park, Saratoga Springs, Mechanicville, Round Lake, Country Knolls, Burnt Hills, Malta, Easton, Stillwater, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Deans Corners, Schaghticoke Hill, Johnsonville, Willow Glen, Coons, Garrison Manor, Wayville, Elnora and Halls Corner. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
